purpose: The email is a call for papers for a special issue on 'Conceptual and Technical Engineering of Blockchain-based Information Systems' in the journal Information Systems. It outlines the submission timeline, including the open date, deadline, and acceptance date. The email describes the significance of blockchain technology in creating decentralized and trustworthy information systems and highlights the challenges and opportunities in this field. It invites contributions on various conceptual and technical topics related to Blockchain-based Information Systems, aiming to advance research and solutions in this area. The email also provides submission guidelines and contact information for the guest editors.

evidence_sentences: This special issue aims to advance the state of BISs and their engineering by addressing conceptual and technical challenges at different levels.
The special issue invites theoretical, conceptual, technical, and practical contributions on various topics related to Blockchain-based Information Systems (BISs).
All manuscripts should be submitted electronically through Editorial ManagerÂ® at https://www.editorialmanager.com/infosys/default.aspx.
